title: 进入地图后一会就会停止工作
author: Mr_Sir
txt_content:
[14:59:21] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Launcher will not exit now.
[14:59:21] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR]

replies.author: 索菲缇娅
replies.txt_content: 重装Java重启游戏重下游戏
